Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 6th overall pick, by Diablo in 1978...
Injured on 5/7/1979 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 7/11/1981, off Gary Chichester (WT)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/6/1983, off Walter Morning (Ash)...
Drove in 6 runs against Lynchburg on 8/16/1984...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Ashburn on 8/15/1985...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/9/1986, hitting .524 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/14/1986, hitting .444 with 4 HR, 6 RBI...
Drove in 7 runs against Halifax on 8/29/1986...
